t:
“There's a man with a bloody knife outside my house,” I said to the policeman on the other side of the phone, shivering in fear.

          “I sent him there,” said the voice
               from the other side, smirking.


 He hung up the phone before I could
    explain that I'd already killed this
                   man last night.
c:
Not exactly a 'short story', but I managed to squeeze in two twists there.



Collab & write a short story titled #2amconversations #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#murderer #knife #ghost #bad #police #twist
